group_1.textCenter: (There just can't be another girl who looks@that much like me...)
(She must be my doppelganger... And she saw@me and everything. I could die...)
(Dad and his students are hopeless when@it comes to doing the housework...)
(I'll need to tell them where the emergency@rations are before I die...)
But I really don't want to die...

group_1.textRight: You look just as upset as you did yesterday.
Yes, I am.
No, I don't need anything. I am merely@concerned about you.
You know, if you worry too much...
...and look so gloomy when dusk falls,@you'll be devoured by a Witch for sure.

group_1.textLeft: You told me something like that yesterday...@What do you mean?
Are you from some kind of cult?

group_1.textRight: Oh, does it look that way?
I see. Then forget what I just said. There@are no Witches.
But I do encourage you to remember this:@Nothing good comes from worrying.
The pain in your heart will affect your body @in time.

group_1.textLeft: If stopping myself from worrying was that@easy, I'd never worry again...

group_1.textRight: Hm, fair...
Would you like to have some tea with me?
Maybe if we talk it through we can find an@answer to your troubles.

group_1.textLeft: I can't just spill everything to you like that.@I don't even know you.

group_1.textRight: I am Kanagi Izumi. Now you know who I am.

group_1.textLeft: I don't have any money to buy tea!

group_1.textRight: As chance would have it, neither do I.
I have enough to buy a can of juice, though.
Ah, a doppelganger... That must've been @remarkable to experience.

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad you're impressed...even though I @might die because of it...

group_1.textRight: Then why not go see her again?
They say there are at least three people@out there in the world with your exact face.
She's likely one of yours.
If you're going to die anyway, why not go@down fighting?
It is.
If she really is your doppelganger, then@fight and triumph over her.
All that housekeeping you do has made you@fierce, Tsukasa.
I'm sure you are stronger than most girls.

group_1.textLeft: That's a weird way to comfort someone.

group_1.textRight: Is it?
I suppose maybe it is.
So what do you plan to do now?

group_1.textLeft: I'm going to try to see her again.

group_1.textRight: Good plan. It's best not to overthink things.

group_1.narration: Talking with Kanagi convinced me@to try visiting the shrine once more.
So I could see who that girl really was...
